admin.title: Admin

admin.proRequiredMessage: This page is only accessible to Pro users. Please apply for Pro access to view administrative statistics and features.

statistics.title: User Statistics
statistics.webCallsTooltip: HTTP requests to static web pages and resources (HTML, CSS, JS files)

statistics.apiCallsTooltip: HTTP requests to backend API endpoints (paths starting with /api/)

aiTest.title: AI Configuration Test
